scripts.copy: node -e "const fs = require('fs'); const data = fs.readFileSync('.env.example'); fs.writeFileSync('.env', data);"
scripts.initialize: yarn copy && docker run --name pg-nc -p  5432:5432 -e POSTGRES_PASSWORD=hello -e POSTGRES_USER=hello -d postgres && yarn
scripts.migrate: npx prisma migrate diff --from-empty --to-schema-datamodel prisma/schema.prisma --script > prisma/migrations/0_init/migration.sql
